= IPJSpecialFolderEnum =

*Project:* [ShellFoldersUnit Shell Folders Unit].

*Unit:* _PJShellFolders_.

_IPJSpecialFolderEnum_ interface to an object that can enumerate the shell's special folder identifiers. _[TPJSpecialFolderEnum TPJSpecialFolderEnum]_ implements the interface.

== Methods ==

|| *Method* || *Description* ||
|| _[AtEnd AtEnd]_ || Tests whether the end of the enumeration has been reached. ||
|| _[Count Count]_ || Returns the number of special folder identifiers in the enumeration. ||
|| _[Init Init]_ || Reinitialises the enumeration. ||
|| _[Next Next]_ || Returns the next identifier in the enumeration. ||
